headerDisplay: Homebridge plugin for Smartika smart lighting hub with 100% local communication (no cloud required). Supports lights, fans, and smart plugs. Leave Hub IP empty for auto-discovery.
footerDisplay: For help and documentation, see the [GitHub repository](https://github.com/pblondin/smartika-homebridge). Use `smartika-cli hub-discover` to find your hub.

name.title: Platform Name
name.description: The name that will appear in Homebridge logs.

hubHost.title: Hub IP Address
hubHost.description: IP address of your Smartika hub. Leave empty for auto-discovery (requires UDP port 4156). Recommended to set a static IP or DHCP reservation.

pollingInterval.title: Polling Interval (ms)
pollingInterval.description: How often to poll the hub for device status updates (in milliseconds).

debug.title: Debug Mode
debug.description: Enable verbose debug logging for troubleshooting connection issues.
